title: Apple releases macOS 12.4 beta 3 to developers [U]
content:
Following up on launching the second macOS 12.4 beta for developers and public testers last week, Apple has seeded the third macOS 12.4 beta today to developers.

more…

The post Apple releases macOS 12.4 beta 3 to developers [U] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Following up on launching the second macOS 12.4 beta for developers and public testers last week, Apple has seeded the third macOS 12.4 beta today to developers. Update: The third macOS 12.4 beta includes the anticipated fix for the Studio Display webcam. Apple releases Studio Display Firmware 15.5 beta for developers; webcam fix included macOS 12.4 beta […]
